channel.title: I Need Help With A Topic
channel.description:
I need help on this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,420946.0.html
Can someone help me on how to do server side things? I put my php things for the numbers of players to show up on my website but I can't find the thing that I need to search for server side.
My base is Delta.
Thanks if you help me. I'll rep+ if you do it well and it works. ;)
